attributes.title: This app cursed me
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app I realized it was trying to take over my brain to become a white supremacist. It put voices in head to support the confederacy and like Cheetos. I tried an exorcism but the priest died trying and the pope reached out and said thereâ€™s nothing he or the Catholic Church can do. I bought cowboy boots and started to become more yeehaw each day. It even took over my brother as he tried to made sexual advances with me and he said the app made him do it and his favorite song is now sweet home Alabama. God please no one download this app it will ruin your life and implant neo nazi worms in your brain.

attributes.title: ğŸ§šğŸ¼‍â™€ï¸â¤ï¸iâ€™d rather throw myself off a boatğŸ¦‹âœ¨
attributes.review: Shortly after i downloaded this app, I started getting advertisements and media from both Russia and China. Soon after this my entire phone and all of my passwords got hacked (this is including my banking information). I had to reset all of my online accounts, and passwords. I never got all of my media back and my bank account was drained rapidly. I had to replace not only all of my online accounts, but also my phone and never got my bank account and money back. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF AT ALL POSSIBLE! If you have already downloaded this app, DELETE IMMEDIATELY!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app two days ago and ever since i downloaded, Iâ€™ve been noticing very weird things. Two minutes after downloading, my grandma died. I thought it was a freak incident and then right after she dropped dead, my grandfather died. It was like dominoes. Two hours go by without a death, and then my dog dies. Next my cat. Followed shortly after by my newborn son. Still I overlooked how freaky it was! The following day, my mother and father both dropped dead! I knew it had to be a sign so I immediately deleted this app and no more loved ones have passed. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU WANT YOUR FAMILY TO SURVIVE! IM THE ONLY ONE LEFT

attributes.title: why does the same cheeto keep popping up?
attributes.review: okay so this is how things went down, i opened the app and saw a cheeto with a flag in the background. the flag had strange symbols and writing on it so i believe that this cheeto might be running some sort of cult. other problems i had with this application was the fact that it would not stop advertising their cult onto me and i felt quite offended. i would NOT reccomend getting this application as it is offensive and shoves cheeto dust down your throat.
